title: Tarpaulin
content: We recommend strong, weatherproof tarpaulin to protect your cargo from dirt and rain. It will allow you to get your cargo to its destination clean and dry whatever the weather, while children can ride with the tarpaulin half or fully rolled back thanks to the flexible adjustment options.
